name: Industrial Sector 0x7F: Rolling Turret
description:
Currently a simple first person shooter about disabling a combat turret, bit by bit. Shoot key areas (camera, ammo storage) to disable the turret.

MouseLook around. WASD/ArrowsMove. SpaceJump. Left Mouse ButtonShoot. Right Mouse ButtonAim down sights or zoom. RReset level. FToggle fullscreen. EscapePause overlay.

Note: At present, controls can't be rebound, and audio volume can't be adjusted. Please adjust audio volume using system audio mixer until I finally add settings menu.
